resources.string: This activity is shown only when the app is launched, and it presents the category choices for the user. \nEvery other activity can be accessed from here.

This activity shows the albums in a list.
 
The album art will be collected using the MediaMetaDataRetriever class.
 
Pressing on an album will open the songs activity showing the songs from the album.
 
Every other activity can be accessed from the activity buttons at the top.

This activity shows the playlists in a list.
 
Pressing on a playlist will open the now playing activity and start playing the songs.
 
Every other activity can be accessed from the activity buttons at the top.

This activity shows the songs in a list.
 
Pressing on a song will open the now playing activity and play the song.
 
Every other activity can be accessed from the activity buttons at the top.

This activity will show and play the current song.
 
There are buttons for moving to the next and to the previous songs in the playlist, and for adjusting the volume.
 
The user would be able also to adjust the volume, from the seek bar which shows the volume state.
 
The play music functionality will be implemented using the MediaPlayer class.
 
Every other activity can be accessed from the activity buttons at the top.
